templates: ${name} is busy organizing a big party for all of ${his_her} friends and needs to buy ${count} ${items}. Each ${item_singular} costs $${price} at the party supply store. ${subj} also ${has_have} to pay an additional $${extra} for ${fee}. How much does ${name} spend in total on these party supplies?

For ${his_her} upcoming class project on science that is due next week, ${name} needs to buy ${count} ${items} at $${price} each from the school supply store. There's also a $${extra} ${fee} fee that must be paid. What is the total cost ${subject} will need to spend?

${name} decided to order ${count} ${items} from an online store to have them delivered to ${his_her} home. Each one costs $${price}, and the ${fee} charge comes to $${extra}. How much did ${subject} pay altogether for this online order?

At the local store near ${his_her} house, ${name} picked up ${count} ${items} priced at $${price} each for an upcoming event. With an additional ${fee} charge of $${extra}, how much did ${subject} end up spending on this shopping trip?

${name} wants to surprise ${his_her} family with a thoughtful gift of ${count} ${items} that ${subject} found at a specialty store. At $${price} each, plus $${extra} for ${fee}, how much will ${subject} need to pay in total for this gift?

While shopping for school supplies at the beginning of the semester, ${name} bought ${count} ${items} at $${price} each and paid an additional $${extra} for ${fee}. What was the total cost of ${his_her} school supply shopping?
gsm8k_style: ${name} goes to the store to buy supplies for ${his_her} upcoming birthday party. ${subj} pick${verb_s} out ${count} ${items} that cost $${price} each. ${subj} also need${verb_s} to pay a ${fee} fee of $${extra} that the store charges on all purchases. How much money in total does ${name} spend at the store for the party supplies including the ${fee} fee?

For a school project that is due at the end of the week, ${name} needs to purchase exactly ${count} ${items}. The local craft store sells them for $${price} apiece. Additionally, there is a mandatory $${extra} ${fee} charge that applies to the order. What is the total amount of money that ${name} will need to pay for all the ${items} and the ${fee}?

${name} is preparing for a camping trip this weekend with ${his_her} friends. ${subj} decide${verb_s} to buy ${count} ${items} at a price of $${price} per ${item_singular} from the outdoor supply store. The store also charges $${extra} for ${fee} on all orders. How much does ${name} end up spending in total at the outdoor supply store?

Every week, ${name} orders ${count} ${items} from ${his_her} favorite online store. Each ${item_singular} costs exactly $${price}, and the store always charges a flat ${fee} fee of $${extra} per order. How much money does ${name} pay in total for this weekly order including the ${fee} charge?

${name} walks into the department store looking for ${items} for ${his_her} new apartment. ${subj} find${verb_s} exactly what ${subject} need${verb_s} and pick${verb_s} up ${count} of them at $${price} each. At checkout, ${subject} learn${verb_s} there's an additional $${extra} ${fee} charge. What is the total amount ${name} pays at the register?
